title: Endings Guide
content: Endings for Baldur's Gate 3 covers all possible conclusions to the game determined by the player's influence on the Forgotten Realms. Each ending is shaped by the key decisions players made throughout the game's Main Quests and Side Quests. How you respond to NPCs during dialogue, how you resolve conflicts in key quests, which Side Quests you choose to pick up and which you don't complete, many choices you make in Baldur's Gate 3 will affect the ending you will get at the end.
